long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension allowing task creation directly from a web page. This is a functionality extended to the use of the Pandra software.

What are the advantages of Pandra's task management and ticketing software?

You can create tasks directly from a given project.

- You assign the task to the right person.
- You enter a status that makes it easier to follow up on the tasks.
- You set a deadline.
- You note the degree of priority. Depending on your settings, this setting defines
the due date directly, without you having to worry about it.
 -You specify the type of task to simplify its classification and processing.
- You can add a description, a checklist, an attachment or even link the task to
a timesheet.
- You can interact with the tasks through the comments section.
- The "follow task" option is effective for automatically adding it to a specific tab on your dashboard in the form of a tab of your dashboard as a list.
- On your task management panel, you can sort tasks by priority, status or due date.

Use Pandra for your projects and your company.
